result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: SENTENCING Transcript commencing NOVEMBER 8, 2016 received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 16CF836 (39 Pages).

Defendant Deonta M Glover in court with attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner.  Defendant Deonta M Glover in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case in court for plea and sentencing.  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on state's motion, Court orders Counts 1 and 2 DISMISSED but read-in to cases 16CF836 and 15CF4854 for sentencing purposes.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Branch 18 is in a court trial on a seperate matter.    Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 18.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 8, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for sentencing hearing with 15CF4854 and 16CF836.  Parties request an adjourned date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 18.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
This case was transferred to Judge Colon, Branch 18 on September 22, 2016.  No action taken by Judge Hanrahan, Branch 4..

Defendant Deonta M Glover in court with attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner.  Defendant Deonta M Glover in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin earlier in the afternoon. Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  William P. Dockry appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  William P. Dockry appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI

Court does not object to potential transfer of case to branch 30.   All parties are advised effective August 1, 2016 this case will be assigned to the Honorable Michael Hanrahan, Branch 4 in Room 515 of the Courthouse.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for August 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Defense counsel requests a projected guilty plea date. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 21.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 18, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea and sentencing. Defense counsel requests more time for a possible global resolution with defendant's other pending cases. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 21.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea and sentencing. Defense counsel requests more time. Court ordered case adjourned for plea and sentencing in Branch 21.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 10, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT PRODUCED FROM THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE FACILITY FOR PURPOSES OF THE PROJECTED GUILTY PLEA AND SENTENCING IN BRANCH 4.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, Defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant not produced from the Criminal Justice Facility for purposes of this hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  Statements by defense counsel that discovery has not yet been received and defendant has a pending felony set for jury trial. Defense requests a status conference date.  All parties are advised effective February 1, 2016 this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 04, Room 515 of the Courthouse.  Any right of substitution begins to run as of the date of receipt of this notice, unless notified by the court on an earlier date.  Status conference scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court via telephone, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Defense counsel unavailable for today's proceedings and requests an adjournment. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  Defense counsel recently appointed and informs the court that defendant has pending felony cases.  Case adjourned to Branch 45  Status conference scheduled for January 21, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
No reply from defendant or surety.

Attorney Kevin Michael Gaertner in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel.  Defense counsel needs to obtain discovery from prior counsel.  Court orders case adjourned for pretrial conference to Branch 45.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, defendant in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record.  Defendant to be evaluated by Public Defender's office to determine eligiblity for representation.  Clerk contacted PD's office to schedule a status of counsel date.  Case adjourned to Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring.    No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Deonta M Glover in court with attorney Darryl E. Smith.  Defendant Deonta M Glover in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Notice of bail forfeiture mailed to surety and defendant; Original in file. ($500.00) gj
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Deonta M Glover not in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for a status conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Attorney Jane Heather Christopherson in court, defendant Deonta M Glover not in court, in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court. Court VACATED Jury Trial on 11/30/2015. Court ordered case adjourned for Status of Counsel in branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for November 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
